title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Introducing the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins, the perfect addition to your holiday celebrations! These beautifully crafted cloth napkins feature a Christmas Nativity scene design, adding a touch of elegance and religious symbolism to your Christmas gatherings and meals.

Made from high-quality polyester, these napkins have a smooth and glossy finish, making them both luxurious and durable. The stunning blue color, adorned with gold embroidered texts, adds a festive atmosphere to your table setting.

Measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), these napkins are the ideal size for any occasion. Each napkin is embroidered with meaningful sayings such as "Joy", "Love", "Blessed", "Merry", "Believe", and "Peace", reminding us of the true essence of Christmas.

Not only are these napkins visually appealing, but they are also practical. They are washable and reusable, ensuring that you can enjoy them for many holiday seasons to come. They are perfect for Christmas, religious or festive occasions, adding a touch of elegance and spirituality to your table.

The Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins also makes a thoughtful gift for your family, friends, or fellow believers. Packed in a set of 12, these embroidered Christmas cloth napkins will bring joy and warmth to any recipient.

Please note that slight errors in size may occur due to manual measurement, and there may be a slight difference in color due to screen display. Rest assured, the words on these napkins are not used as a trademark, but only for expression.

Celebrate the true meaning of Christmas with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Add them to your cart now and make your holiday gatherings unforgettable!
